awards.text: Nominated for 1 BAFTA Film Award. Another 3 wins & 4 nominations.

fullplot: Through a series of flashbacks, four young chinese women born in America and their respective mothers born in feudal China, explore their past. This search will help them understand their difficult mother/daughter relationship.
plot: The life histories of four Asian women and their daughters reflect and guide each other.
title: The Joy Luck Club
